articles.author: Catherine Belton, Emily Rauhala
articles.title: Europe's military industrial capabilities fall short of Ukraine's needs - The Washington Post
articles.description: Western governments have failed to act fast enough to turn around their industrial policy to meet Ukraine’s needs for weapons and ammunition, experts said.
articles.content:
